name: historically
content:
Add to word list

C1 in a way that is related to the study or representation of the past: historically accurate The film makes no attempt to be historically accurate.historically significant The city will provide grants to help restore historically significant buildings.
C1 in comparison with prices, values, etc. in the past: Fuel prices are coming down, but they've been historically high for months. The unemployment rate has remained historically low.
in the past: Historically, there have always been close links between France and Scotland. See
historical
More examplesFewer examplesYou need to look at this issue historically.He pointed out that garlic was historically used as a medicine in many cultures. Historically, prices have dropped by as much as a dollar a pound from the beginning of the season to the end.
